descriptionHtml:
I made this sword a while ago, and thanks to Phate3 it works in game.

I figured i could share it with other, so i\'m uploading it now

It\'s basically the sword from The legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess, but I made the hilt black and left the hole at the part at the end of the hilt, since i like it more that way.

it\'s pretty strong... I don;t like slashing my enemy\'s for 5 minutes before he FINALLY dies, so it is a lethal blade, not one hit kill, but lethal.

it\'s a one hander, found in the steel catagory in the crafting screen

if you want to implement it in your mods, you can do that, just send me a message that you did. maybe i also want your mod xD
and please credit me
author: Mandarinn
